text: Robert K. Corbin (born November 17, 1928) is an American lawyer and politician. He was the 21st Attorney General of Arizona from 1979 to 1991. He was the president of the National Rifle Association of America from 1992 until 1993. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:Living people Category:Arizona attorneys general Category:Politicians from Indiana Category:Lawyers from Indiana Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Robert K. Corbin
